"Hah!": "Haaa.... haaa...! This is our last hope... I won't let you take it away from us!"
"I'm sorry... I'm so sorry...! I couldn't... protect it...!"
"I fought so hard...as hard as I could... We were so close... but I failed."
"I wanted to save Xiao...! But I... I...!"
"You're right, he's still here in my heart!"
"Which means the essence of all creation... is in my heart!"
